{"id":514660872,"lang":"java","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1624930817,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/514660872/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"39.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        ListNode t1=l1;\n        ListNode t2=l2;\n        ListNode ans=new ListNode();\n        ListNode res=ans;\n        int car=0;\n        while(true){\n            int sum=0;\n            if(t1!=null){\n                sum+=t1.val;\n                t1=t1.next;\n            }\n            if(t2!=null){\n                sum+=t2.val;\n                t2=t2.next;\n            }\n            ans.val=(sum+car)%10;\n            if(sum+car>9){\n                car=1;\n            }\n            else{\n                car=0;\n            }\n            if(t1==null && t2==null) break;\n            ans.next = new ListNode();\n            ans=ans.next;\n        }\n        if(car==1){\n            ans.next = new ListNode();\n            ans=ans.next;\n            ans.val=1;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
